Hu Don was a bushi in Tu Lung in 1358 DR.
Hu Don was a bushi in the town of Pe Nok in Tu Lung. In 1358 DR, he became the leader of the local Dragon Claw followers, destroying local martial schools and shrines. Later, Hu Don was confronted and killed by the wu jen Ko La Ko and an adventuring party hired by Ko Ho San.
